Suspicious process accessing the system.Data: Windows Event ID 4657, Windows Event ID 4663
Suspicious process accessing the system.Action: Monitor Windows Event IDs 4657 (Value Set) and 4663 (Object Access) on the registry key 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Nls\Language'. Filter by object name and identify suspicious process paths. Use statistical methods to find anomalous access patterns by time or process frequency.

Execution of commands associated with sy.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for processes with command line arguments containing 'locale'. Identify source process paths and parent processes. Correlate command execution with user context and identify deviations from normal user behavior using descriptive statistics.
